title: Jitsu wa Ore, Saikyou deshita? ~ Tensei Chokugo wa Donzoko Sutāto, Demo Ban’nō Mahō de Gyakuten Jinsei o Jōshō-chū! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Abandoned Children   Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Beastkin   Brother Complex   Cousins   Fantasy World   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Royalty   Secret Identity   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Sister Complex   Sword And Magic   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Sumimori Sai   すみもりさい   澄守彩
description:
I, a HIKKI-NEET, suddenly reincarnated in another world as a prince, and was immediately deemed the weakest ever, with my life already in a pinch after being abandoned as a baby, being stared down by a huge beast!? 

However, I could only use one kind of magic. It was close, but I was able to avoid a “dead end” in my first few days of being born using that magic. 

Anyways, I just want to live a lazy shut-in life as an adopted noble with my one all-purpose magic, but…?>
